name: Wizard Rize
description:
Wizard Rize, a long lost game for the NES

Long ago, a cyborg wizard heard of a potion that could grant him eternal happiness. After many years of searching, the wizard had finally found the location of the potion - atop a treacherous tower. Help the wizard climb the tower and find the potion that he seeks!

CONTROLS:

Z/Enter - Shoot

X/Space - Jump

A/Left arrow - Walk left

D/Right arrow - Walk right

Any of the keys above - Start

Made in 72 hours for Lost Cartridge Jam 2021. Thanks for playing!

ASSETS:

Music was composed in GarageBand with the YMCK Magical 8-Bit Plugin (following NES limitations, with two square channels, one triangle, and one static)

The font used is Press Start 2P

All other assets were made within the 72-hour jam
